Package helicopterbattle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Class for animations, e.g.
    Bullet
    Helicopter machine gun bullet.
    Canvas
    Create a JPanel on which we draw and listen for keyboard and mouse events.
    EnemyHelicopter
    Enemy helicopter.
    Framework
    Framework that controls the game (Game.java) that created it, update it and draw it on the screen.
    Game
    Actual game.
    MovingBackground
    Moving background image.
    PlayerHelicopter
    Helicopter which is managed by player.
    Rocket
    Rocket.
    RocketSmoke
    Rocket smoke.
    Window
    Creates frame and set its properties.

    Framework.GameState
    Possible states of the game
